workaround

g = tf.get_default_graph()
s = tf.Variable("hi")
print("Global variables", tf.global_variables())
del g._collections[tf.GraphKeys.GLOBAL_VARIABLES][0]
print("Global variables", tf.global_variables())

body:
workaround
```
g = tf.get_default_graph()
s = tf.Variable("hi")
print("Global variables", tf.global_variables())
del g._collections[tf.GraphKeys.GLOBAL_VARIABLES][0]
print("Global variables", tf.global_variables())

```
